DOC.brief_summary: Subjects Hemodialysis randomize AMG 073 placebo . The screening period maximum 30 day follow 26-week treatment period . Lab assessment complete throughout study along PRO assessment .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study AMG 073 Hemodialysis Subjects
DOC.criteria: Men Women great equal 18 year age Using effective contraceptive measure Mean iPTH screen great equal 300 pg/mL Mean calcium screen great equal 8.4 mg/dL Stable hemodialysis Unstable medical condition Parathyroidectomy within 3 month Change Vitamin D therapy Receiving antidepressant Experienced MI within 3 month Inability swallow tablet Previously receive AMG 073
